title: Definitely not Rengar
body:
Rengar dressed as a kitty would be the perfect "Definitely not Skin"

any other champs and definitely not skin ideas?

replies.body:
{{champion:121}} :"I swear, I saw Rengar a few minutes ago but now all I see is this kitten. Have you seen Rengar?"
{{champion:107}} :"Meow."
{{champion:121}}:"Hmm...maybe hes that orange fur-ball over there."
{{champion:150}} "TONIGHT, WE HUNT."

As a fan of Rengar, I could not take him saying "Tonight we hunt" seriously in that skin. ;D

Nice idea, though.
